Name: Highway Thru Hell
Title: Heavy Hearts
Desc: Merv is dispatched in a 50-ton rotator to open the road after a collision in Fraser Valley.
LongDescription: Merv is dispatched in Aggressive Towing's 50-ton rotator to open the road after a collision in Fraser Valley; Jamie takes a classic wrecker on a 2,000-kilometre journey north; news about a key member of the Mission Towing family hits home.
